data.name: SharePoint Saturday New York City 2020
data.description: Administrators, end-users, architects, developers, and other professionals that work with Microsoft Collaboration or Cloud Technologies will meet to share the latest information for working with SharePoint, Microsoft365, the Power Platform and related offerings from Microsoft.

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Day - Milwaukee
relatedRecords.description:
All around the world user groups and communities want to learn about Azure and Cloud Computing!
On April 23-25, 2020, all communities will come together once again in the seventh great Global Azure event! Each user group organizes their own one to three day Azure event the way they see fit and how i…

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: Highlights from the Manchester AWS Community Summit held in Manchester 2019. Check our Channel to view the talks in full. Our next event will be held in October in London. If you’re interested in becoming a sponsor please contact joe@comsum.co.uk.
